banana: Ensure good drainage and monitor for fungal infections like Sigatoka.
apple: Use pruning to control spread and apply copper-based fungicides.
corn: Ensure nitrogen levels are adequate. Rotate crops to reduce pests.
tomato: Avoid leaf wetting. Use resistant varieties and proper staking.
potato: Plant certified seeds. Avoid waterlogging and rotate crops.
mango: Monitor for anthracnose. Use copper sprays and prune for airflow.
grape: Use trellising. Control downy mildew with regular inspection.
rice: Maintain water levels. Use neem-based sprays for pest control.
